voiceToText.title: Voice to Text Transcription
voiceToText.subtitle: Convert conversations in real-time
voiceToText.description: Capture any conversation and automatically convert it to text. Actively participate in classes, meetings, or daily conversations without missing a detail.
steps: Activate the microphone in the app
Read the text in real-time on your screen

translation.title: Automatic Translation
translation.subtitle: Access content in any format

steps: Upload or select content to translate
AI processes and translates the content

interpretation.title: LSC Interpretation
interpretation.subtitle: Connect with professional interpreters
interpretation.description: Access Colombian Sign Language interpreters via video call or scan QR codes at companies, hospitals, and universities.
steps: Scan the QR code or open video call
End session and rate the service

steps: The assistant suggests improvements in real-time
Publish or send your perfected text
